mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (member_name, login_id, member_password, member_email, job_group, job_role, career_years) VALUES (#{member_name}, #{loginId}, #{member_password}, #{member_email}, #{jobGroup}, #{jobRole}, #{careerYears})
mapper.select: SELECT member_id, member_name, login_id, member_password, member_email, job_group, job_role, career_years, created_at, updated_at FROM member WHERE member_id = #{memberId}
SELECT member_id, member_name, login_id, member_password, member_email, job_group, job_role, career_years, created_at, updated_at FROM member WHERE login_id = #{loginId}
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET member_email = #{member_email}, job_group = #{jobGroup}, job_role = #{jobRole}, career_years = #{careerYears}, updated_at = now() WHERE member_id = #{memberId}
